text: Mi iffe$ Ïalut, s lâaskeô, inna: "Öebbi, s tidep, a kwen Ijeôôeb s wasif. Win iswan segs, ur illi yidi. Win ur neswi, neppa, s tidep, yidi. Kkes ed win iswan cwiî, deg ufus is". Swan segs, siwa ixeîîayen segsen. Mi zegren, neppa akked wid iumnen yides, nnan: "ur nezmir assa, i Oalut akked lâaskeô is". Nnan wid issarmen ar nitni ad mlilen d Öebbi: "acêal d abrid, îayfa tameééyant te$leb îayfa tameqwôant, ma Irad Öebbi". Öebbi ar iûebôiyen
